statement: Boneca Ambalabu gives you a sequence of n integers a_1,a_2,...,a_n.Output the maximum value of (a_k\oplus a_1)+(a_k\oplus a_2)+...+(a_k\oplus a_n) among all 1 â‰¤q k â‰¤q n. Note that \oplus denotes the bitwise XOR operation.
input_specification: InputThe first line contains an integer t (1 â‰¤q t â‰¤q 10^4)Â â€“ the number of independent test cases.The first line of each test case contains an integer n (1 â‰¤q nâ‰¤q 2Â· 10^5)Â â€“ the length of the array.The second line of each test case contains n integers a_1,a_2,...,a_n (0 â‰¤q a_i < 2^{30}).It is guaranteed that the sum of n over all test cases does not exceed 2Â· 10^5.
output_specification: OutputFor each test case, output the maximum value on a new line.
